settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
settings.logoutError: Failed to log out. Please try again.
settings.witnessModeRequired: Defender mode requires camera, microphone, and location permissions to record incidents. Please grant these permissions to continue.
settings.cameraPermissionExplanation: We need camera access to record video during defender mode and incident reporting. This helps document encounters and provide evidence for legal purposes.
settings.microphonePermissionExplanation: We need microphone access to record audio during defender mode and incident reporting. This helps document encounters and provide evidence for legal purposes.
settings.locationPermissionExplanation: We need location access to report community alerts, track incidents, and share your location with emergency contacts and attorneys during SOS situations. This helps ensure your safety and enables accurate incident reporting.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data
settings.deleteAccountWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
settings.deleteAccountConsequence1: Remove all your personal information and data
settings.deleteAccountConsequence2: Delete all your saved forms and documents
settings.deleteAccountConsequence3: Remove your emergency contacts and attorney connections
settings.deleteAccountConfirmCheckbox: I understand that this action is permanent and cannot be undone
settings.deleteAccountTypeError: Please type 'Delete Account' exactly to confirm
settings.deleteAccountConfirmError: Please confirm that you understand the consequences
settings.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
settings.deleteAccountUserError: Unable to retrieve user information. Please try again.

profile.title: Profile
profile.maxContactsMessage: You can only have {count} emergency contacts. Please remove one before adding another.
profile.trustLevelHelp: Trust levels are earned through verification and KYC (Know Your Customer) processes. Complete your profile verification to increase your trust level and ensure the information you share is accurate and trustworthy.
profile.addYourFirstContact: Add your first emergency contact to get started
profile.userNotFound: User not found. Please log in again.
profile.updateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile.contactsPermissionExplanation: Legal Defender needs access to your contacts to help you quickly add emergency contacts from your phone book. This makes it easier to set up your profile and ensure your emergency contacts are accurate.
profile.contactsPermissionMessage: Please grant contacts permission to import contacts.
profile.failedToLoadContacts: Failed to load contacts. Please try again.
profile.confirmDeleteContact: Are you sure you want to remove
profile.failedToDeleteContact: We couldn't remove this contact. Please check your connection and try again.
profile.failedToAddContact: We couldn't add this contact. Please check your connection and try again.
